Bombs.name: Bomb
Bombs.description: Increase the number of deployable bombs.

Bombs.name: Mine Bomb
Bombs.description: A bomb that activates when a monster or player steps on it. When deployed, it will fade into the ground. Typically, only the first bomb placed by a player will be a Mine Bomb.

Bombs.name: Rubber Bomb
Bombs.description: These bombs have the looks and properties of a rubbery substance and will bounce when kicked or thrown/punched.

Bombs.name: Ice Bomb
Bombs.description: A bomb that freezes enemies on explosion.

Bombs.name: Dangerous Bomb
Bombs.description: A bomb that explodes in a specific radius.

Bombs.name: Power Bomb
Bombs.description: A bomb with an extremely large explosion radius.

Bombs.name: Pierce Bomb
Bombs.description: A bomb with a fire explosion that pierces through obstacles.

Bombs.name: RC Bomb
Bombs.description: A remote-controlled bomb that can be detonated at will.

Fires.name: Fire
Fires.description: Makes the explosion travel one step further.

Fires.name: Ice Fire
Fires.description: A fire explosion that freezes enemies.

Fires.name: Bouncing Fire
Fires.description: A fireball that bounces off walls.

Fires.name: Mega Fire
Fires.description: An extremely powerful and destructive fire explosion.

Bomb manipulation.name: Bomb Kick
Bomb manipulation.description: Allows the bomber to kick bombs in a specific direction.

Bomb manipulation.name: Power Glove
Bomb manipulation.description: Enables the bomber to throw bombs at a distance.

Bomb manipulation.name: Punching Glove
Bomb manipulation.description: Allows the bomber to punch bombs away.

Bomb manipulation.name: Vest
Bomb manipulation.description: Make the player invincible for a short time.

Vitamins.name: Protein
Vitamins.description: Increases the Attack stat of a Pokémon.

Vitamins.name: Calcium
Vitamins.description: Increases the Special Attack stat of a Pokémon.

Vitamins.name: Iron
Vitamins.description: Increases the Defense stat of a Pokémon.

Vitamins.name: Zinc
Vitamins.description: Increases the Special Defense stat of a Pokémon.

Vitamins.name: Carbos
Vitamins.description: Increases the Speed stat of a Pokémon.

Vitamins.name: HP Up
Vitamins.description: Increases the HP stat of a Pokémon.

Vitamins.name: PP Up
Vitamins.description: Increases the PP (Power Points) of a Pokémon's moves.

Vitamins.name: PP Max
Vitamins.description: Increases the maximum PP of any move to 160% of the original PP. Can be used once per move. Raises the Pokémon's Happiness.

Electronics.name: Pokédex
Electronics.description: A device that records information about Pokémon.

Electronics.name: PokéNav
Electronics.description: A multifunctional device that provides navigation and communication features.

Electronics.name: VS Seeker
Electronics.description: A device that allows the player to rematch trainers for additional battles.

Electronics.name: Radio Card
Electronics.description: A card that grants access to various radio channels for news and music.

Electronics.name: Xtransceiver
Electronics.description: A communication device that enables video calls with other trainers.

Electronics.name: Battle Recorder
Electronics.description: A device that records and replays Pokémon battles for analysis.

Poke balls.name: Poké Ball
Poke balls.description: A standard Poké Ball used to capture wild Pokémon.

Poke balls.name: Great Ball
Poke balls.description: A Poké Ball with a higher capture rate than a standard Poké Ball.

Poke balls.name: Ultra Ball
Poke balls.description: A Poké Ball with a higher capture rate than a Great Ball.

Poke balls.name: Master Ball
Poke balls.description: A Poké Ball with a 100% capture rate. It can catch any wild Pokémon.

Poke balls.name: Premier Ball
Poke balls.description: A rare Poké Ball given as a bonus for purchasing multiples of standard Poké Balls.

Poke balls.name: Dusk Ball
Poke balls.description: A Poké Ball with a higher capture rate when used in dark areas or at night.

Poke balls.name: Quick Ball
Poke balls.description: A Poké Ball with a higher capture rate when used at the start of a battle.

Poke balls.name: Repeat Ball
Poke balls.description: A Poké Ball with a higher capture rate when used on a Pokémon that has been previously caught.

Poke balls.name: Nest Ball
Poke balls.description: A Poké Ball with a higher capture rate on Pokémon with lower levels.

Mushrooms.name: Super Mushroom
Mushrooms.description: Makes Mario grow larger in size and gain an extra hit point.

Mushrooms.name: 1-Up Mushroom
Mushrooms.description: Grants Mario an additional life when collected.

Mushrooms.name: Mega Mushroom
Mushrooms.description: Temporarily transforms Mario into a giant, allowing him to crush enemies and obstacles.

Mushrooms.name: Poison Mushroom
Mushrooms.description: Has a detrimental effect on Mario, causing him to shrink or lose a life.

Mushrooms.name: Mini Mushroom
Mushrooms.description: Shrinks Mario in size, allowing him to access hidden areas and platforms.

Mushrooms.name: Propeller Mushroom
Mushrooms.description: Gives Mario the ability to perform a high vertical jump and hover in the air.

Flowers.name: Super Leaf
Flowers.description: Transforms Mario into Raccoon Mario, granting him the ability to fly and swipe enemies with his tail.

Flowers.name: Fire Flower
Flowers.description: Enables Mario to shoot fireballs and defeat enemies from a distance.

Flowers.name: Ice Flower
Flowers.description: Allows Mario to throw iceballs that freeze enemies and create platforms.

Flowers.name: Boomerang Flower
Flowers.description: Grants Mario the ability to throw boomerangs that can defeat enemies and collect items.

Flowers.name: Gold Flower
Flowers.description: Turns Mario into Gold Mario, allowing him to turn blocks and enemies into coins.

Flowers.name: Cape Feather
Flowers.description: Transforms Mario into Cape Mario, granting him the ability to fly and perform spin attacks.

Flowers.name: Star
Flowers.description: Temporarily makes Mario invincible and increases his running speed.

Tools.name: Hammer
Tools.description: Allows Mario to break certain blocks and defeat enemies by throwing hammers.

Tools.name: P-Wing
Tools.description: Grants Mario unlimited flight and invincibility for the duration of a level.

Tools.name: Tanuki Suit
Tools.description: Transforms Mario into Tanooki Mario, granting him the ability to glide and turn into a statue to avoid enemies.

Tools.name: Blue Shell
Tools.description: Provides Mario with a protective shell that allows him to slide and defeat enemies.

Tools.name: Cannon Box
Tools.description: Turns Mario into Cannon Mario, allowing him to shoot cannonballs to reach distant areas.

Tools.name: Penguin Suit
Tools.description: Transforms Mario into Penguin Mario, giving him the ability to slide on ice and swim more effectively.

Tools.name: Propeller Box
Tools.description: Gives Mario a propeller on his head, enabling him to perform high jumps and reach higher platforms.
